verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you בֶן־ <WH1121> Also thou son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> to הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> unto the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> and say הָרֵי֙ <WH2022> Ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Because אָמַ֧ר <WH559> hath said הָאוֹיֵ֛ב <WH341> Because the enemy עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> against הֶאָ֑ח <WH1889> against you Aha וּבָמ֣וֹת <WH1116> high places עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> even the ancient לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <WH4181> are ours in possession הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> have become לָּֽנוּ׃

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> Therefore prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> and say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֣עַן <WH3282> reason בְּיַ֡עַן <WH3282> reason שַׁמּוֹת֩ <WH8074> Because they have made [you] desolate וְשָׁאֹ֨ף <WH7602> and swallowed you up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> מִסָּבִ֗יב <WH5439> on every side לִֽהְיוֹתְכֶ֤ם <WH1961> become מֽוֹרָשָׁה֙ <WH4181> that ye might be a possession לִשְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> unto the residue הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen וַתֵּֽעֲל֛וּ <WH5927> and ye are taken up עַל־ <WH5921> in שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> in the lips לָשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> of talkers וְדִבַּת־ <WH1681> and [are] an infamy עָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Therefore הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> Therefore ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3068> GOD כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְ֠הוִה <WH3068> GOD לֶהָרִ֨ים <WH2022> to the mountains וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <WH1389> and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <WH650> to the rivers וְלַגֵּאָי֗וֹת <WH1516> and to the valleys וְלֶחֳרָב֤וֹת <WH2723> wastes הַשֹּֽׁמְמוֹת֙ <WH8076> desolate וְלֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> and to the cities הַנֶּעֱזָב֔וֹת <WH5800> that are forsaken אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הָי֤וּ <WH1961> have become לְבַז֙ <WH957> which became a prey וּלְלַ֔עַג <WH3933> and derision לִשְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> to the residue הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> that [are] round about ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> GOD אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֠א <WH3808> not בְּאֵ֨שׁ <WH784> Surely in the fire קִנְאָתִ֥י <WH7068> of my jealousy דִבַּ֛רְתִּי <WH1696> have I spoken עַל־ <WH5921> against שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> against the residue הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the heathen וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> and against all Idumea כֻּלָּ֑א <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who נָתְנֽוּ־ <WH5414> which have appointed אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצִ֣י ׀ <WH776> my land לָ֠הֶם <WH1992> as לְמ֨וֹרָשָׁ֜ה <WH4181> into their possession בְּשִׂמְחַ֤ת <WH8057> with the joy כָּל־ <WH3605> all לֵבָב֙ <WH3824> of all [their] heart בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <WH7589> with despiteful נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> minds לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of מִגְרָשָׁ֖הּ <WH4054> to cast it out לָבַֽז׃ <WH957> for a prey

לָכֵ֕ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> Prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> concerning אַדְמַ֣ת <WH127> therefore concerning the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <WH559> and say לֶהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> unto the mountains וְ֠לַגְּבָעוֹת <WH1389> and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֨ים <WH650> to the rivers וְלַגֵּאָי֜וֹת <WH1516> and to the valleys כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold בְקִנְאָתִ֤י <WH7068> in my jealousy וּבַחֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> and in my fury דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> Behold I have spoken יַ֛עַן <WH3282> because כְּלִמַּ֥ת <WH3639> the shame גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the heathen נְשָׂאתֶֽם׃ <WH5375> because ye have borne

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I נָשָׂ֣אתִי <WH5375> I have lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֑י <WH3027> mine hand אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֤א <WH3808> not הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> Surely the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לָכֶ֣ם מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> that [are] about הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> will themselves כְּלִמָּתָ֥ם <WH3639> their shame יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <WH5375> you they shall bear

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> O הָרֵ֤י <WH2022> But ye O mountains יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel עַנְפְּכֶ֣ם <WH6057> your branches תִּתֵּ֔נוּ <WH5414> ye shall shoot forth וּפֶרְיְכֶ֥ם <WH6529> your fruit תִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> and yield לְעַמִּ֣י <WH5971> to my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קֵרְב֖וּ <WH7126> for they are at hand לָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> to come

כִּ֖י <WH3588> for הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> about וּפָנִ֣יתִי <WH6437> For behold I [am] for you and I will turn אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> to you וְנֶעֱבַדְתֶּ֖ם <WH5647> unto you and ye shall be tilled וְנִזְרַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH2232> and sown

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֤י <WH7235> And I will multiply עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> and אָדָ֔ם <WH120> men כָּל־ <WH3605> all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> upon you all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <WH3605> all וְנֹֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> shall be inhabited הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <WH5892> [even] all of it and the cities וְהֶחֳרָב֖וֹת <WH2723> and the wastes תִּבָּנֶֽינָה׃ <WH1129> shall be builded

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֧י <WH7235> And I will multiply עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> on אָדָ֥ם <WH120> upon you man וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> and beast וְרָב֣וּ <WH7235> and they shall increase וּפָר֑וּ <WH6509> and bring fruit וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֨י <WH3427> and I will settle אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> כְּקַדְמֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6927> you after your old estates וְהֵטִֽבֹתִי֙ <WH2895> and will do better מֵרִאשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7221> [unto you] than at your beginnings וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

וְהוֹלַכְתִּי֩ <WH1980> along עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <WH5921> and אָדָ֜ם <WH120> Yea I will cause men אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֤י <WH5971> upon you [even] my people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel וִֽירֵשׁ֔וּךָ <WH3423> and they shall possess וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> you will become לָהֶ֖ם לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> thee and thou shalt be their inheritance וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not תוֹסִ֥ף <WH3254> and thou shalt no more ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again לְשַׁכְּלָֽם׃ <WH7921> henceforth bereave ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because אֹמְרִ֣ים <WH559> Because they say לָכֶ֔ם אֹכֶ֥לֶת <WH398> unto you Thou [land] devourest up אָדָ֖ם <WH120> men [אָתִּי כ] (אָ֑תְּ <WH859> you ק) וּמְשַׁכֶּ֥לֶת <WH7921> and hast bereaved [גֹּויֵךְ כ] (גֹּויַ֖יִךְ <WH1471> Gentile ק) הָיִֽית׃ <WH1961> become

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore אָדָם֙ <WH120> men לֹא־ <WH3808> will no תֹ֣אכְלִי <WH398> Therefore thou shalt devour ע֔וֹד <WH5750> longer [וְגֹויֵךְ כ] (וְגֹויַ֖יִךְ <WH1471> Gentile ק) לֹ֣א <WH3808> and no [תְכַשְּׁלִי־ כ] (תְשַׁכְּלִי־ <WH3782> bereave ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer ק) נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> any more saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor אַשְׁמִ֨יעַ <WH8085> Neither will I cause [men] to hear אֵלַ֤יִךְ <WH413> about עוֹד֙ <WH5750> anymore כְּלִמַּ֣ת <WH3639> in thee the shame הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> the reproach עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> of the people לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִשְׂאִי־ <WH5375> any more neither shalt thou bear ע֑וֹד <WH5750> any [וְגֹויֵךְ כ] (וְגֹויַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1471> the nations ק) לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תַכְשִׁ֣לִי <WH3782> to fall ע֔וֹד <WH5750> longer נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> any more saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> when the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> dwelt עַל־ <WH5921> their own אַדְמָתָ֔ם <WH127> in their own land וַיְטַמְּא֣וּ <WH2930> they defiled אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> בְּדַרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> it by their own way וּבַעֲלִֽילוֹתָ֑ם <WH5949> and by their doings כְּטֻמְאַת֙ <WH2932> me as the uncleanness הַנִּדָּ֔ה <WH5079> of a removed woman הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become דַרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> their way לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> was before

וָאֶשְׁפֹּ֤ךְ <WH8210> Wherefore I poured חֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and עַל־ <WH5921> on הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> upon them for the blood אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁפְכ֣וּ <WH8210> that they had shed עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the land וּבְגִלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1544> and for their idols טִמְּאֽוּהָ׃ <WH2930> [wherewith] they had polluted

וָאָפִ֤יץ <WH6327> And I scattered אֹתָם֙ <WH853> בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> them among the heathen וַיִּזָּר֖וּ <WH2219> and they were dispersed בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> through the countries כְּדַרְכָּ֥ם <WH1870> according to their way וְכַעֲלִילוֹתָ֖ם <WH5949> and according to their doings שְׁפַטְתִּֽים׃ <WH8199> I judged

וַיָּב֗וֹא <WH935> And when they entered אֶל־ <WH413> to הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> unto the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> whither they went שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> they וַֽיְחַלְּל֖וּ <WH2490> they profaned אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> my holy בֶּאֱמֹ֤ר <WH559> when they said לָהֶם֙ עַם־ <WH5971> to them These [are] the people יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> These וּמֵאַרְצ֖וֹ <WH776> out of his land יָצָֽאוּ׃ <WH3318> and are gone forth

וָאֶחְמֹ֖ל <WH2550> But I had pity עַל־ <WH5921> and שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> for mine holy אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which חִלְּל֙וּהוּ֙ <WH2490> had profaned בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> which the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> whither they went שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Therefore say לְבֵֽית־ <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD לֹ֧א <WH3808> for לְמַעַנְכֶ֛ם <WH4616> your sake אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> I do בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> not [this] for your sakes O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo לְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> name's קָדְשִׁי֙ <WH6944> but for mine holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חִלַּלְתֶּ֔ם <WH2490> sake which ye have profaned בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּ֥אתֶם <WH935> whither ye went שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וְקִדַּשְׁתִּ֞י <WH6942> And I will sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִ֣י <WH8034> name הַגָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> my great הַֽמְחֻלָּל֙ <WH2490> which was profaned בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חִלַּלְתֶּ֖ם <WH2490> which ye have profaned בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> in the midst וְיָדְע֨וּ <WH3045> shall know הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <WH1471> of them and the heathen כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD בְּהִקָּדְשִׁ֥י <WH6942> when I shall be sanctified בָכֶ֖ם לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> in you before their eyes

וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <WH3947> For I will take אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> you from among הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the heathen וְקִבַּצְתִּ֥י <WH6908> and gather אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> you out of all countries וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <WH935> and will bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into אַדְמַתְכֶֽם׃ <WH127> you into your own land

וְזָרַקְתִּ֧י <WH2236> Then will I sprinkle עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> and מַ֥יִם <WH4325> water טְהוֹרִ֖ים <WH2889> clean וּטְהַרְתֶּ֑ם <WH2891> upon you and ye shall be clean מִכֹּ֧ל <WH3605> all טֻמְאוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH2932> from all your filthiness וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> all גִּלּ֥וּלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1544> and from all your idols אֲטַהֵ֥ר <WH2891> will I cleanse אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> also will I give לָכֶם֙ לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart חָדָ֔שׁ <WH2319> A new וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit חֲדָשָׁ֖ה <WH2319> you and a new אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> will I put בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <WH7130> within וַהֲסִ֨רֹתִ֜י <WH5493> you and I will take away אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֤ב <WH3820> heart הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> the stony מִבְּשַׂרְכֶ֔ם <WH1320> out of your flesh וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and I will give לָכֶ֖ם לֵ֥ב <WH3820> you an heart בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> of flesh

וְאֶת־ <WH853> רוּחִ֖י <WH7307> my spirit אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> And I will put בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <WH7130> within וְעָשִׂ֗יתִי <WH6213> you and cause אֵ֤ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> my בְּחֻקַּי֙ <WH2706> in my statutes תֵּלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> to walk וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <WH4941> my judgments תִּשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> and ye shall keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> and do

וִישַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <WH3427> And ye shall dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> that I gave לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> to your fathers וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <WH1961> become לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> and ye shall be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <WH595> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> and I will be your God

וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּ֣י <WH3467> I will also save אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all טֻמְאֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH2932> you from all your uncleannesses וְקָרָ֤אתִי <WH7121> and I will call אֶל־ <WH413> for הַדָּגָן֙ <WH1715> for the corn וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֣י <WH7235> and will increase אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and I will not אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> it and lay עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> and רָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> no famine

וְהִרְבֵּיתִי֙ <WH7235> And I will multiply אֶת־ <WH853> פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> the fruit הָעֵ֔ץ <WH6086> of the tree וּתְנוּבַ֖ת <WH8570> and the increase הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> so אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> after לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תִקְח֥וּ <WH3947> that ye shall receive ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again חֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> no more reproach רָעָ֖ב <WH7458> of famine בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the heathen

וּזְכַרְתֶּם֙ <WH2142> Then shall ye remember אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1870> ways הָרָעִ֔ים <WH7451> your own evil וּמַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4611> and your doings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> were not טוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> that [were] not good וּנְקֹֽטֹתֶם֙ <WH6962> and shall lothe בִּפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> yourselves in your own sight עַ֚ל <WH5921> for עֲוֹנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5771> for your iniquities וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8441> and for your abominations

לֹ֧א <WH3808> for לְמַעַנְכֶ֣ם <WH4616> your sake אֲנִֽי־ <WH589> I am עֹשֶׂ֗ה <WH6213> Not for your sakes do נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> I [this] saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יִוָּדַ֖ע <WH3045> be it known לָכֶ֑ם בּ֧וֹשׁוּ <WH954> unto you be ashamed וְהִכָּלְמ֛וּ <WH3637> and confounded מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1870> for your own ways בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> In the day טַהֲרִ֣י <WH2891> that I shall have cleansed אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all עֲוֹנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5771> you from all your iniquities וְהֽוֹשַׁבְתִּי֙ <WH3427> I will also cause [you] to dwell אֶת־ <WH853> הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> in the cities וְנִבְנ֖וּ <WH1129> shall be builded הֶחֳרָבֽוֹת׃ <WH2723> and the wastes

וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> land הַנְּשַׁמָּ֖ה <WH8074> And the desolate תֵּֽעָבֵ֑ד <WH5647> shall be tilled תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> instead אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> of being שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> whereas it lay desolate לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of everyone עוֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> of all that passed by

וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they shall say הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> land הַלֵּ֙זוּ֙ <WH1977> This הַנְּשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH8074> that was desolate הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> has become כְּגַן־ <WH1588> is become like the garden עֵ֑דֶן <WH5731> of Eden וְהֶעָרִ֧ים <WH5892> cities הֶחֳרֵב֛וֹת <WH2720> and the waste וְהַֽנְשַׁמּ֥וֹת <WH8074> and desolate וְהַנֶּהֱרָס֖וֹת <WH2040> and ruined בְּצוּר֥וֹת <WH1219> [are become] fenced יָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <WH3427> [and] are inhabited

וְיָדְע֣וּ <WH3045> you shall know הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> Then the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that יִֽשָּׁאֲרוּ֮ <WH7604> that are left סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶם֒ <WH5439> round about כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> that I the LORD בָּנִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1129> build הַנֶּ֣הֱרָס֔וֹת <WH2040> the ruined נָטַ֖עְתִּי <WH5193> [places and] plant הַנְּשַׁמָּ֑ה <WH8074> that that was desolate אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> have spoken וְעָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <WH6213> [it] and I will do ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD ע֗וֹד <WH5750> also זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise אִדָּרֵ֥שׁ <WH1875> I will yet [for] this be enquired לְבֵֽית־ <WH1004> of by the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do לָהֶ֑ם אַרְבֶּ֥ה <WH7235> [it] for them I will increase אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> כַּצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> like a flock אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> them with men

כְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> flock קָֽדָשִׁ֗ים <WH6944> As the holy כְּצֹ֤אן <WH6629> as the flock יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem בְּמ֣וֹעֲדֶ֔יהָ <WH4150> in her solemn feasts כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> so תִּהְיֶ֙ינָה֙ <WH1961> become הֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> cities הֶחֳרֵב֔וֹת <WH2720> so shall the waste מְלֵא֖וֹת <WH4392> be filled צֹ֣אן <WH6629> with flocks אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of men וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס
